The name and extension of the Swift file in which the previous step’s code resides within your documentation catalog. DocC uses this file for comparison against the current step’s code, so the reader can see what changed. By default, DocC automatically compares the current step’s code against the previous step’s code for differences. This parameter only needs a value if you want to override the default comparison and use a different previous file.
